pages.title: about
pages.text: BioI am Lu Zhang, a first-year Ph.D. student in the Aerial Robotics Group, Robotics Institute, the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). My supervisor is Prof. Shaojie Shen. I received my M.Eng. and B.Eng. from the Beijing Institute of Technology, Beijing, China, supervised by Yi Yang. My research topic is autonomous navigation for mobile robots. Now, Iâ€™m working on motion planning and behavior planning for autonomous vehicles. News (Feb. 2019) A paper is submitted to IEEE RA-L with IROS 2019. Video & Code (Sept. 2018) Join HKUST Aerial Robotics Group. (May 2018) Join DJI for an internship. (Mar. 2018) Graduate from the Beijing Institute of Technology.
